casebody.data:
The State of Ohio, Appellee, v. Briscoe, Appellant.

[Cite as State v. Briscoe, 124 Ohio St.3d 117, 2009-Ohio-6540.]

(No. 2009-0089 Submitted September 30, 2009 Decided December 17, 2009.) William D. Mason, Cuyahoga County Prosecuting Attorney, and Lisa Reitz Williamson, Assistant Prosecuting Attorney, for appellee. Timothy Young, Ohio Public Defender, and Jeremy J. Masters, Assistant Public Defender, for appellant.

{¶ 1} The judgment of the court of appeals is affirmed on the authority of State v. Lester, 123 Ohio St.3d 396, 2009-Ohio-4225, 916 N.E.2d 1038.

Moyer, C.J., and Pfeifer, Lundberg Stratton, O’Connor, O’Donnell, Lanzinger, and Cupp, JJ., concur.
